description:
System menu with:

- About this computer
- Software Update
- Software Center

- System Preferences
- Gnome Tweak Tool

- System Monitor
- Force quit (Active application)

- Power Off
- Log Out
- Lock

Extension Settings:

- Position at the top bar
- Software Center (Ubuntu software center by default)
- Remove system buttons from "user/status" menu

Original extension: https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/653/xmenusystem/
The first author does not want to develop it anymore, so I uploaded it here and opened a github repository. Feel free to contribute there.
name: System Menu
